description:
Junos Pulse for iOS enables secure connectivity over SSL VPN to corporate applications and data from anywhere, at any time. Using Junos Pulse, you can connect securely to your corporate Juniper Networks SA Series SSL VPN gateway and gain instant access to business applications and networked data from wherever you are.

REQUIREMENTS:
Juniper Networks SA Series SSL VPN Gateway running version 6.4 or later. Learn more at http://www.juniper.net/us/en/local/pdf/app-notes/3500191-en.pdf. Please check with your Help Desk or Corporate IT department to be sure your SSL VPN is ready for Junos Pulse for iOS.

JUNOS PULSE v1.0 FEATURES:
o    SSL VPN connectivity using ESP or SSL transport mode to the Juniper SA Series gateway.
o    Connects to one SA Series gateway at a time while allowing you to store information for multiple gateways in Configurations for later use.
o    Automatically reconnects to the SA Series SSL VPN Gateway upon network changes (3G to Wi-Fi, or vice-versa), temporary network disruptions, or when your iOS device wakes up from sleep.
o    Option to Email Logs to IT Support for troubleshooting and assistance.

JUNOS PULSE v2.0 FEATURES:
o    Access to web-based applications and corporate email within the app. Access is provided via the Juniper SSL VPN Rewriter.

JUNOS PULSE v2.0.2 FEATURES:
o    Support for secondary authentication when client certificate authentication is the primary authentication method.
o    The app no longer exits when suspended. This allows the login process to be "paused" while credentials are obtained from a 3rd party app.

JUNOS PULSE v2.1.0 FEATURES:
o    The app is now a universal iOS app, with native user interfaces for all platforms (iPhone, iPod Touch, and iPad).

JUNOS PULSE v3.0.0 FEATURES:
o    Adds support for mobile device management (MDM) and configuration capabilities found in the iOS platform – including enforcing and setting passcode policies, provisioning and removal of Microsoft Exchange profiles, provisioning of VPN and Wi-Fi settings, remote locate and track and remote lock and wipe of lost or stolen iPhones and iPads, and inventory and restriction of applications – allowing Apple iPhones and iPads to be configured and managed over the air (OTA) by the Junos Pulse Mobile Security Suite 3.0.

JUNOS PULSE v4.0.0 FEATURES: 
o    Several user interface enhancements to integrate Junos Pulse Collaboration (which is available as a license with the Junos Pulse Secure Access Service (SSL VPN)) on the Junos Pulse home page for iOS devices. Junos Pulse Collaboration can be launched and enable users to connect to meetings and collaborate from iOS devices. 
o    Several enhancements to iOS Mobile Device Management (MDM), including the ability to control Apple MDM features in iOS 5 for iCloud and Exchange ActiveSync.
o    The ability to configure VPN on Demand settings from within the Junos Pulse configuration menu.

Note: Continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life.
releaseNotes:
Pulse Mobile 5.0R8

New features:
•iOS 8 firmware support.
•Improvements in App VPN SDK.

Issues fixed in PulseM5.0R8 for iOS:
317677 – On iOS 8 devices, per App VPN application traffic is not going through VPN tunnel.
318368 – In App VPN SDK Handle IO failures properly on iOS.
